## Overview
In this markdown we will explore text mining. We will be using the "hgwellsr" package that provides access to the full texts of six novels by H. G. Wells.

We will be using the following libraries:
*dplyr
*stringr
*tidyr
*appa

```{r Load Packages}
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
```
